channel.title: Frozen but still using Melee?
channel.description: Hello! I have a "major" pking problem. Say you freeze someone, and walk away(more than one square away) the person frozen can attack you with melee still which ruins many methods of pking. If anyone could help me I would appreciate it very much, Thanks.

item.title: Frozen but still using Melee?
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

Hello! I have a “major” pking problem. Say you freeze someone, and walk away(more than one square away) the person frozen can attack you with melee still which ruins many methods of pking. If anyone could help me I would appreciate it very much, Thanks.

Read full topic
